actions.message:
**Misc Commands**
`//help` Shows this message
`//say (ANYTHING)` Sends what ever you want it to say
`//bcast (ANYTHING)` Sends a server broadcast [ADMIN-ONLY]
`//download (ANYTHING)` Fake download anything
`//wdh` Gets all `WatchDog` commands
`//wdr (@USER AND REASON)` Report a user to server admins
`//myavatar` Shows your avatar image
**Moderation Commands**
`//ban @USER` Bans a user from your server
`//purge (AMOUNT)` Delete bulk messages
`//rolecreate (NAME)` Creates a role
`//warn @USER (REASON)` Warns a user

Technobot discord server: https://discord.gg/QcRB6Jt
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message: If a `WatchDog` message did not appear make sure to mention the user!

actions.message: `WatchDog` You were warned in ${msg.channel} by ${member} for ${tempVars("warn")}
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: `WatchDog` Make sure to include a member or it wont work, if you did they should have recieved a message saying: You were warned in ${msg.channel} by ${member} for ${tempVars("warn")}
